settings.section_subtitle: Senior faculty who lead our core curriculum areas with unmatched expertise and industry recognition.

settings.name: Dr. Jennifer Walsh
settings.title: Chief Academic Officer
settings.bio: 25+ years in amusement safety engineering, including 15 years as Director of Safety at Universal Studios. Instrumental in developing modern ride safety protocols now industry standard.

settings.name: Michael Torres
settings.title: Head of Operations Training
settings.bio: Former Operations Director at Six Flags with 20+ years managing daily operations across multiple parks. Expert in staff training, emergency procedures, and guest experience optimization.

settings.section_subtitle: Subject matter experts who bring deep, specialized knowledge to our advanced certification programs.

settings.name: David Chen
settings.title: Electrical Systems Specialist
settings.bio: Master Electrician with 18+ years in amusement ride electrical systems. Former Chief Electrician at Disney Parks, specializing in complex control systems and electrical safety protocols.

settings.name: Lisa Rodriguez
settings.title: Aquatic Safety Director
settings.bio: Aquatic safety expert with 15+ years managing water park operations. Former Director of Aquatic Safety at Schlitterbahn, certified in advanced water rescue and facility management.

settings.name: Robert Kim
settings.title: Compliance & Inspection Expert
settings.bio: Former state ride inspector with 20+ years in regulatory compliance. Extensive experience with ASTM standards, state regulations, and international safety codes across multiple jurisdictions.

settings.name: Sarah Mitchell
settings.title: Mechanical Systems Engineer
settings.bio: Mechanical engineer with 16+ years in ride design and maintenance. Former Senior Engineer at Intamin, specializing in high-thrill coaster systems and predictive maintenance protocols.
